static_hints:
Use LEFT and RIGHT
ARROW KEYS to walk.
Press SPACE or Z to jump.

Use UP and DOWN
ARROW to climb.

Use UP ARROW to interact
with objects.

Press DOWN + ATTACK
to perform a
down attack.

Press UP at a savepoint
to save your progress.
item_hints:
Press LEFT CTRL or X to
attack.

Press LEFT SHIFT or C to
cast a spell.

Press JUMP BUTTON TWICE
to do a double jump.

Press RIGHT SHIFT or M
to open the map.
item1:
It is a cheap plastic toy,
manufactured in a country
that no longer exists.
item2:
You obtain the TOME OF
PURPLE FIREBALLS!

This book teaches you how
to cast purple fireballs.
Orange fireballs require
more advanced magic.
item3:
You obtain LEATHER BOOTS OF
SPEED!

These footwear are not real
leather and barely even
boots, but hey, now you
can run fast!
item4:
Now you just need to find
a lock it opens.
item5:
You obtain FINALLY A GOOD
SWORD!

Like its name suggests, it
is finally a good sword.
Excellent, even.

In fact, this sword is so
good it can even break
rocks!
item6:
You obtain a DOUBLE (PAIR
OF) JUMPING SHOES!

I'm seeing double here,
four jumping shoes!

Or, in fact, two pairs of
jumping shoes. They grant
you a double jump ability.
item8:
It will automatically map
the area you have
visited.
item9:
You obtain a HAPPY BAG
OF MONEY MONEY MONEY!

It is a bag full of money.
You are rich! Kind of.
item10:
You obtain a SMALL BAG
OF NOT SO MUCH MONEY!

It is a tiny leather bag
that barely contains
any money at all.
What a disappointment!
story_intro:
A thousand times you
have died...

A thousand times I
have brought you
back...

Once again, an epic
quest awaits you...

So wake up, it is
time for one last
adventure!
npc1:
Welcome, great hero! Your
great adventure begins
here.

We could not afford an epic
storyline, but there should
be a final boss waiting
for you somewhere.
npc2:
The shopkeeper lives in
that hut. His only job is
to stand there and wait for
your money.
npc3:
These caves were supposed
to be mines, but we could
not afford to buy proper
props.

We do have some violent
miners ready to kill you.
We did not even have to pay
them!
npc4:
You can use those funky
teleporters to travel
around this world
instantly.

To make your life more
interesting, we decided to
disable them. Maybe there
is a switch somewhere
nearby?
npc5:
The final boss lives in
that castle. She is
afraid of people, so we
locked the door using
four magic gems.

In hindsight, we should
have used a regular key.
npc6:
We almost had minibosses
here. But then a global
pandemic hit and we could
not get any spare parts we
needed.
npc7:
See that hut? There should
be a switch that lets
you activate the island-
wide air circulation
system.

We wasted way too much
money when building that,
though.
npc8:
These caves are in a
different plane of
existence than the rest
of the island.

I have no idea what do
these words mean, this
is just the official
explanation I was given.
npc9:
It took us a long time to
hide all these chests
around the island, but it
would be dumb to give you
all items in the beginning.
npc10:
I put my life savings
inside that chest. You can
take them, I get more
money once this nonsense
is over.
npc11:
All the great stories had
already been told. They
were usually starred by
your previous in-
carnations.

This explains why the story
you experience here is...
pretty barebones. Hard
to tell a story when
there is nothing to tell.
npc12:
There used to be thousands
of final bosses roaming
on this island. Now, they
are all dead, killed by
your predecessors.

Because of this, we had to
create our own final boss.
Too bad our budget was
pretty tight.
npc13:
I do not understand why
she expects us to do
whatever she says.

'Write an epic story,'
she says. 'Find an epic
final boss,' she says.

I had nothing against you,
though, I just do not
always... undestand.
npc14:
I painted those planets.
It took me five weeks,
but I am really proud
of the result.

Of course, one could ask
do we really need those
planets.

Well, this was supposed
to be an interplanetary
adventure, but we ran
out of time.
npc15:
If you are going to kill
the final boss, please
be gentle. This is her
first time as the final
boss.
shop_item_desc:
Hearts and magic
bottles are
more efficient.
nomoney:
You don't have
enough money to
buy this item!
shop_confirm:
Buy this item for
% gold coins?
switch:
You have activated the...
the... uh, air circulation
system? Well, whatever it
is, the fans are spinning
now!

You have activated the...
the... uh, global tele-
portation system?
shopitem1:
It increases your maximal
life by one!
shopitem2:
It increases your maximal
magic... umm, capacity,
I think?
shopitem3:
They might be made out of
wood, but considering how
weak you are, they still
make you stronger.
shopitem4:
You obtain a can of MAGIC
BEANS!

These things are illegal
in most countries, but
they do make you feel
magical!
shopitem5:
It seems to be made of
aluminum foil, but it
boosts your confidence,
which reduces the damage
you take.
shopitem6:
This watch runs slightly
slower than an ordinary
clock, which makes your
attacks faster. Don't
ask why, though.
shopitem7:
You obtain a bottle of
SNAKE OIL!

Believe it or not, this...
stuff increases your
vitality, making hearts
and magic bottles more
efficient.
gem:
It is so full of magic it
almost looks like an
ordinary gem.
ending:
I tried to give you
one last great
adventure.

There was supposed to
be an epic story
where you are the
hero.

There was supposed to
be an epic battle
in the end.

But all the stories
had already been
told.

And all the final
bosses had already
been killed.

At least you can
finally sleep.
